commentaire: I needed a bank I could trust, with an actual physical location to interact with. Not spending countless hours on the phone just to try to get my money; and they were there when needed. In the age when people pretend to be other people, Meriwest provides me ample security, safety, and peace of mind in knowing they can‚Äôt be defrauded putting my money in safe hands.

Titre: Horrible Customer Service
commentaire:
I was an almost 30 year client of Meriwest until they upgraded their login system with minimal notification and locked my out of my account. After multiple attempts, I final sent a registered letter to close my account back in March, and have yet to get my money back (now May). They continue to send me e-notices even though I have told them multiple times I can't login (probably telling me about all the fees that they are charging me rather than giving my money back as requested). I suspect I am going to have to get a lawyer involved to get my money back from them.

Bottom line: I would bury my money in glass jars in the backyard before I would use Meriwest again. They certainly put profits ahead of customer satisfaction.

In summary, Meriwest Credit Union offers not only top-notch service, but also advantageous credit conditions. My experience financing my car through them was seamless and stress-free. I wholeheartedly recommend Meriwest for anyone in need of financial services.

Titre: Two workers, Two different answers
commentaire: I went into cash express on Eastern Bypass. I went in early because I got my check early. I ask the girl who waited on me if it would be a problem paying early. She says no, I don't see a problem with it. So I reborrow, after paying. Next month comes and a different girl calls and says I am down to pay that day. I said I don't get my check till the first and the 3rd. She says we'll the 3rd is 4 days out. I said well I get a check the first also and that is 2 days out. She says well your check may be here when you come or it may not be. I said well do what ever you have to but I don't get paid till the first and 3rd. Can come in the first. So today I look at my bank account and sure enough she had turned it in and it's pending. I don't care mind you but the other girl had told me it would be fine. This dark haired girl that called me has always been so hateful. I always avoid having to deal with her and always go to the other register. The black haired girl is a very pretty girl but her attitude and personality and hatefulness does not go with her beauty. But how is one worker saying one thing and another worker saying another helping at all. I been going there for a few years. I will be finding another location. I will go to the one on Main Street. Evidently paying early makes a whole lot of difference.

Titre: Run Away!! Do not walk
commentaire:
PNC Bank. We will never do business with them again. My wife and I Got a Car loan from them at the Dealership because they were the lowest interest rate at the time. Our first payment was due in 6 weeks. We kept looking for the first payment in the mail but it never came. So we called. They mail the bill two weeks before it is due. That means you get the bill one week before they start charging you additional interest. I find it to be the closest thing to a scam there is. They intentionally send you the bill late to collect higher interest fees. Making payments online or over the phone is difficult and tedious at best. This billing practice should be outlawed and a class action suit should be filled against them.
Never again will we do business with such an immoral company that skirts the law like PNC Bank. Run do not walk away from any dealings with PNC bank or any other like this.

Titre: BEWARE! DO NOT RELY UPON THEIR CARDS ABROAD!!
commentaire:
Domestically PNC is great "BUT" DO NOT rely upon their credit or debit cards when abroad!!!!

I have dealt with nothing but chaos for past three years when traveling with their cards. Unfortunately, they just are not set up for international transactions or business. You can not call them, you can not verify anything because they require text codes which too often you can not receive and thus they will then lock your card. Too often you will have to sit on hold for at least 30min at $1-$2 per minute just to speak to someone. Then there are issues at most ATM machines abroad. If you don't remember to inform them of your travels prior to leaving expect your card to be locked and cycle of trying to reach them repeats. They expect you to inform them of your travel every 30 days therefore you will repeat cycle of chaos trying to reach them.

Make your life simple and do not use their cards abroad!! You have been warned!! Lol.

I found internationally it's best to go with either more Chase or Bank of America unfortunately.

Titre: Unfair and Untruthful
commentaire: Several years ago our mortgage was sold to PNC without our knowledge or consent. We made payments to them for many years with no problems. Recently we were in a position to pay off our balance. There are no physical locations close to us, so we drove 90 miles to the nearest branch in Owensboro Ky. We met with a gentleman who explained that he would contact the payoff dept and they would fax him a final payoff amt. He asked us to return in a couple of hrs and he would have that payoff statement for us. We came back later, as directed, and he gave us a letter stating the final payoff if it was pd in 10 days. We went to our personal bank the next morning and got a cashier's check FOR THAT AMOUNT IN FULL and mailed it immediately. Imagine our surprise a few days later when the bank called and said that we didn't pay enough!!! They claimed that we still owed another $150. When I pressed the caller as to why we still owed she kept saying someone made a math error on their end or they keyed in the wrong figure by mistake. This is unacceptable! They CONVENIENTLY offered to take the amt from our escrow acct which we had been assured would be refunded. This is wrong, unfair and PNC pulled a fast one.
